items.sentence: Tom poured himself another glass of wine from the bottle.
Tom told me he heard something, but he wasn\'t sure what.
We hope to see a lot of development over the next decade.
Jobs are hard to come by with so many people out of work.
Just this morning, Tom repaid Mary the money he owed her.
Last summer, Tom went to Boston and Mary went to Chicago.
Tom said that he\'d never seen anything like this before.
You need to take your shoes off before entering the room.
You can save your breath. There is no use talking to him.
Buying new equipment isn\'t going to solve your problems.
I suppose it could have been Tom who ate my ham sandwich.
I think Tom looked better before he shaved his beard off.
I suggested to Tom that he shouldn\'t trust Mary so much.
What are you going to do with your share of the treasure?
When Tom is in trouble, he always turns to Mary for help.
Who was it that forgot to lock the door of the warehouse?
A truck hit some kids at a bus stop and one of them died.
Can you tell me where you were at the time of the murder?
Will you still love me after you get to know the real me?
Would someone please translate this sentence into French?
